summary:
This mod attempts to resurrect the chameleon effect from previous Elder Scrolls games. Features enchanted armor, spell tomes, rings, and necklaces: All integrated into the levelled lists.
HUGE THANKS TO MAEGFAER FOR THE RESOURCES
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][b][/b][/u][size=6][u][b]Chameleon Alpha[/b][/u][/size]



This mod attempts to resurrect the chameleon effect from previous Elder Scrolls games. Features enchanted armor, spell tomes, rings, and necklaces: All integrated into the levelled lists.

For those of you who don't know, or don't remember, the chameleon effects in Morrowind and Oblivion were spells and enchantments that made the player partially invisible, while still retaining the ability to interact with the environment, unlike invisibility. I used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44317/?][b]Maegfaer[/b]'s assets[/url] to make this mod. He created the effects, I just implemented them.[b]
[/b]




Note: This mod is [i]definitely[/i] a [b]work in progress[/b], so please report any bugs you find immediately. I have not yet fully playtested all of the features I have implemented, so I am posting this alpha version on the Nexus for feedback. Thanks for playing!

-Zer0The0Her0[/center]
author: Zer0The0Her0
